alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 2:58PM EDT until March 12 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... Southern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 257 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lenox to Sparks to 10 miles southwest of Adel, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Ray City, Lenox, Morven, Berlin, Cecil, Reed Bingham State Park, New Lois, Massee, Greggs, Flat Ford, Wagon Wheel, Allenville, Weber, Teeterville and Cottle. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes
